title: REDMAGIC 7 delivers Snapdragon 8 Gen 1-powered gaming, here’s how early birds can save
content:
Mobile gaming just keeps getting better as Android gets more games and chipsets become more powerful. REDMAGIC 7 is being released this month, and early-bird buyers can save on the powerful new gaming phone. Here’s how.

more…

The post REDMAGIC 7 delivers Snapdragon 8 Gen 1-powered gaming, here’s how early birds can save appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The RedMagic 7 has Snapdragon 8 Gen 1-powered Android gaming and top-tier specs, and you can save on its cost with this special offer.
